verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thou mighty Christ, come forth in me,
My will, my way I yield to Thee.
Thou barren sing a travailing song,
Oh, praise His name, it won't be long.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Rise up, ye sons, ye men of war
The day is come, the night is o'er:
Our God has said, "Victory's with thee",
We'll take our land from the enemy.
